name: Universe Edge
blurb: A single-player, spaceship-building, crew-management, space-exploration game. (Short pre-alpha demo available)

rewards.reward:
[Uranus]
______________________________
Your name in the credits for supporting the game's development!
______________________________
Special Kickstarter-only forum title.
______________________________
Special Kickstarter-only SpaceHub Badge (If that stretch goal is reached)

[Jupiter] - Early Bird
______________________________
Full game and all future updates (DRM Free Digital Copy / Steam key if it gets into Steam).
______________________________
Access to Pre-Alpha builds on December 2014.
______________________________
(Includes all lower tiers).

[Sun]
______________________________
Full game and all future updates (DRM Free Digital Copy / Steam key if it gets into Steam).
______________________________
Access to Pre-Alpha builds on December 2014.
______________________________
(Includes all lower tiers except Jupiter).

[Sirius]
______________________________
Include your name/or a chosen name in the name generator of the Crews. No offensive names.
______________________________
(Includes all lower tiers except Jupiter).

[Pollux]
______________________________
Design a ship that will be available in a special section of the in-game shipyard for all the players to be able to auto-construct.
______________________________
You can also set a name and a description of the ship.
______________________________
(Includes all lower tiers except Jupiter).

[Arcturus]
______________________________
Design a ship that will roam the universe. Will they raid and attack other ships? or assist those in need? or just mine asteroids and contribute to the economy?
______________________________
You can also set a name and a description of the ship.
______________________________
(Includes all lower tiers except Jupiter).

[Aldebaran]
______________________________
Design an in-game structure that all players can visit and find in-game. It could be anything, a spacestation for trading, warp gate, shipyard for auto-contructing.
______________________________
You can also set a name and a description of the structure.
______________________________
(Includes all lower tiers except Jupiter).

[Pistol]
______________________________
Design an entire fleet of ships that roam together in the universe. What's is their goal and traits? (maximum of 10 ship variations)
______________________________
You can also the names and the description of the fleet.
______________________________
Delivery date may vary and will be sorted by how easy to implement your own traits, they will be included in updates during the development.
______________________________
(Includes all lower tiers except Jupiter).

[Rigel]
______________________________
Design an equipment's or armament's functionality/idea. You can also write their description and you can put your name as the inventor.
______________________________
No Teleport, duplicator, replicator, one-hit destruction or anything that will greatly unbalance the game. 
______________________________
Delivery date may vary and will be sorted by how easy to implement them, they will be included in updates during the development.
______________________________
(Includes all lower tiers except Jupiter).

[Antares]
______________________________
Design one of the starting scenarios of the game, the intro story, the default ship, and name the crews.
______________________________
Delivery date may vary depending on the magnitude of your scenario idea.
______________________________
(Includes all lower tiers except Jupiter).

[Betelgeuse]
______________________________
Design and Name one of the Planets, name yourself as the discoverer. What does it look like? What kinds of creatures that lives in it? Give out your best alien ideas and fantasy, and come up with even the most tiny details. We'll work on it together.
______________________________
Must be technically compatible with the mechanics of the game.

Delivery date may vary depending on the magnitude of your planet idea.
______________________________
(Includes all lower tiers except Jupiter).
